Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

RIB_ENTRY_TYPE

The basic type RIB_ENTRY_TYPE describes the type of the RIB entry.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 RIB_FUNCTION Entry is a callable function. (Debugger value: 0).
 RIB_ATTRIBUTE Entry is a read-only attribute. (Debugger value: 1).
 RIB_PREFERENCE Entry is a read-write preference. (Debugger value: 2).


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Structures: RIB_INTERFACE_ENTRY
